price: 97. Ir sakyk: „Mano Viešpatie, aš prašau Tavo apsaugos nuo Šajatin (velnių) šnabždesių (pasiūlymų).“
arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنۡ هَمَزَٰتِ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينِ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waqul rabbi aʿūdhu bika min hamazāti al-shayāṭīni
